data.name: Cyber City Clash
data.detailed_description:
Cyber City Clash is a 2.5D arcade fighting game set in a near future dystopian environment. Battle your way through the various areas of the Cyberpunk city in either single player vs AI, or against a friend in 2 player modes.

Features:

* Fight across multiple stages based in various locations in the cyberpunk city, each rendered in gorgeous detail.
* Engage in combat with your choice from ten cyber fighters each with their own characteristics.
* Single player vs AI game mode.
* Player vs Player local multiplayer mode.
* Online Player vs Player mode, featuring rollback netcode functionality.
* Simplified control system makes it great for beginners or casual fighters as well as experts alike.
* Tutorial mode that introduces the fundamentals of fighting in Cyber City Clash.
* AI difficulty setting to adjust the game to your skill level
* Stunning visuals, rendered in 4K on supported hardware.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better
